channel.title: Q about lvling billy...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Q about lvling billy..."

item.title: Re: Q about lvling billy...
item.content:encoded: found a almost sure way to win the mission Billy ,Ky, and Sicko and to be safe use icko's jutsu Dance of the Crescent Moon

item.title: Re: Q about lvling billy...
item.content:encoded:
There are two sure ways to level an ally…have the Red Eye bloodline and be in a village with the Infinite Awareness upgrade ( Due to its high cost, this is unlikely ), or use the jutsu "The Thrill of Victory" taught by Anonymous lvl 2.

Our runner up is the All Together theme for double chance to level allies. If you don't have it, you'll simply have to work to get it next time you loop.

At least, that's all I know and could find. Of course, just trying to do it the hard way a while longer would help too.

item.title: Re: Q about lvling billy...
item.content:encoded: keep getting the missions but can't level him up. seemed to be easier in the first season to do so. What is a sure way to get him to lvl 2 tried a combo of everything and one I have no luck

item.title: Re: Q about lvling billy...
item.content:encoded:
All missions are always available when taking random missions. There is no mission that can only be obtained by running a specific stat.

However, Billy2, Stalkergirl2, and Pinky2's respective level up missions are not rare. You can get them either by doing general or specific B-Rank missions.

item.title: Q about lvling billy...
item.content:encoded: can you get him from a random lvl b mission? its seems like stalkgirl and pinky are lvling only in random…and billy quest aint popping in random…
